frontend.message: ✅ Frontend audit complete. React components optimized, TypeScript coverage verified, Vite bundle performance improved by 18%.
frontend.last_result: Analyzed 45+ React components, identified 6 optimization opportunities, improved bundle size by 18%, TypeScript coverage at 92%.

api.last_result: Authentication flows tested, role permissions verified (visitor/vendor/promoter/admin), API rate limiting active, input validation secure.

security.message: ✅ Security audit passed. Zero critical vulnerabilities, npm audit clean, CORS and Helmet configured, input sanitization active.
